name: The Parable of the Prodigal Son
name_original: The Parable of the Prodigal Son
description:
"The Parable of the Prodigal Son" is a parable told by Jesus Christ in Luke 15:11-32. It tells the tale of a younger son who squanders his father's wealth, goes through famine and returns home. How will his family react on his return? This parable demonstrates God's love for each of us when we return into His presence. 

Explore this Bible story like never before in a one-of-a-kind Visual Novel! This Visual Novel features the musical talent of Michael Levy and the rich artistry or Bhanu Prakash! 

Along with the Visual Novel, I have included a collection of jpg files featuring the wonderful artwork! They are available for personal use and include backgrounds and characters. Feel free to use them as Desktop backgrounds or digital pictures. (I only request that you do not attempt to sell or commercialize these pictures. You may distribute them, but only for free)

To share my favorite parable with you all, this project is 100% free. Instead of donating to me, reach out to local charities and offer them what you can. Feel free to share this as much as you like! If you wish to stream this Visual Novel or publish video commentary, you are also more than welcome to do so!

May the Love of God, the mercy of Jesus Christ, and the conviction of the Holy Spirit be with you all, now and forever. Amen.
